Class Room

java.lang.Object
  lab2Source.MapSite

public class Room
extends MapSite

A room class that holds the walls or doors.

correctRoom

public boolean correctRoom(int x,
                           int y)
Decides wiether or not this is the correct room which means that the room is placed at the x and y coordinates.

Parameters:
x - The searched rooms x coordinate.
y - The searched rooms x coordinate.
Returns:
True if this is the correct room false otherwise.
